name: Astray (itch) (LugaW, TommyGoDoWork)
description:
For those who was not be able to watch the trailer on Youtube:

Bilibili version: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Mp4y1473f/

Astray is a narrative game based on an imaginary story of a lost cat who is trying to recover her memories and find her owner.
The game explores the cat’s journey through the city, trying to follow a familiar woman she saw passing by, who looks like someone that appeared in her dreams. We wanted to deliver our players a feeling of love and the joys of reunion.

Game designers & Programmers:

Luga Wang, Tommy Kim

Audio designers: 

Ananta Arora, Zhe Ji, Christopher LoMagno
